value: Sorry but there are no any suggestions by your text. Please try to type another one.
Sorry but there are no any available public transport at that moment. Please try another stop.
The language setting has been changed

Welcome to the Departure Board. Prague bot. To start using it please type here the stop/station name. (The bot supports Cyrilic letters.) The bot will return you info about the nearest public transport for your stop/station If your stop/station has multiple transport types, the bot will suggest you to select particular one.

This bot has several commands: 
	/start - Starts bot conversation 
	/settings - Allows you select language 
	/help - Shows help message
